show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
Jeanne Stolzer, professor of child and adolescent development, will amaze you with her science-based  insights into the... <!--more--> vast importance of truly natural childbirth, of nursing, and of mother-child physical and emotional closeness.  Controversial and factual.  Hear me lapse into stunned silence.
   PS:  I’ll be giving a free lecture at her university in Kearney, Nebraska the evening of Sept 15.
